name: Toxic Wastris
description:
Toxic Wastris is inspired by classic block dropping games, and was the first thing I thought of when I decided to attempt the #OneGameAMonth jam this year. Drop the toxic waste into the underground facility as efficiently as you can, or it will fill up and the local towns and villages will be overcome with radiation!

Art (such as it is) and code by me and my dog: @RubyIsDog

Awesome chip tune by Pant0don

Built with the amazing LibGDX.

Short boring devlog post here
